Uses of Class
com.orchestranetworks.service.Role

Packages that use Role
com.orchestranetworks.service Provides classes and interfaces for implementing specific services and access rules on EBX5. 
com.orchestranetworks.service.directory Provides classes for Directory handling. 
com.orchestranetworks.workflow Provides classes and interfaces for implementing workflow processes and invoking them.
